name: You need to make changes
body:
Dear ((first name)) ((last name))

Your ((partner)) has said that some of the information in your ((isDivorce??divorce application))((isDissolution??application to end your civil partnership)) is incorrect. They have made the following comments:  

"((applicant 2 comments))"

#What you can do
If you agree with their comments then you can sign in and edit your application. It will then be sent to them to review again. 

Sign in: ((signin url)) 

If you need more information, then you could contact them and ask to explain what needs changing, if it's safe to do so. 

If you do not think you and your ((partner)) will reach agreement on the application, then you can make a sole application for a divorce. This will mean your ((partner)) is not able to review the application before it is submitted. They will respond to it after it is submitted. 

You can change to a sole application by signing in to your account and changing the answer to the question which asked you: 'how do you want to apply ((isDivorce??for the divorce))((isDissolution??to end your civil partnership))'.

Divorce and Dissolution
HM Courts & Tribunals Service
divorcecase@justice.gov.uk
0300 303 0642 (Monday to Friday, 8am to 6pm)

Your feedback helps improve this service for others: https://www.smartsurvey.co.uk/s/Divorce_Feedback/?pageurl=/email
